Title: Windows Application with Bluetooth and QR Code Detection - Upwork
Description:
We have developed a smart beverage fridge with built-in cameras, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth and require a Windows 10 application to be developed to aid with the quality assurance process at our factory. The application will communicate with our product over Bluetooth to start and monitor quality assurance tests.

Below is a high-level overview of the workflow the application must enable. Detailed specifications for the user interface, Bluetooth service and web server will also be provided.

1. Allow the user to type a Bluetooth MAC address into a text field.

2. The application must start a local web server on the device to accept image uploads (encoded in base64 format) over the network.

3. When the last character is entered, start scanning for Bluetooth devices with the entered MAC address.

4. When the device is discovered, connect to our Bluetooth service on the device.

5. Begin listening for any test errors by observing the errors characteristic of the service.

6. Send a JSON encoded Wifi configuration payload to the WiFi configuration characteristic to connect the device to a specific WiFi network.

7. Listen to updates on the connected WiFi network characteristic to wait for the WiFi to connect.

8. Send a pre-specified JSON payload to start test characteristic to begin the test.

9. When the images are received on the local web server, Run QR code detection on each image to ensure they contain a given QR code.

10. Write the result in a CSV file.

11. Display the test pass/fail clearly to the user on the screen, along with any errors.

We have an existing QA application that does these jobs that can be used for reference, however it is written with a cross-platform SDK and lacks the reliability and stability we require.
